page.title: 05FARMING
page.content: {Agriculture}_ Dairy and beef farming, mainly Friesian cattle (high milk yield and good for beef).Few South Devons.Farms range from 50 to 200 acres.Main crops are early potatoes, winter and spring barley, broccoli,cabbage, turnips, stubble turnips, and flowers (mainly daffodils).Extensive grass for grazing, hay and silage (clamp and big bale in plastic bags). {Flower farming}_ daffodils _ golden harvest,ducat,carlton,soleil d'or,gigantic star,Hollywood, Californian. {Horticulture}_ small scale.Tomatoes, lettuce and strawberries. {Fishing }_ mackerel,conger,dogfish, crab,lobster,plaice,cod,monkfish,Dover and lemon sole. {Game}_ pheasants reared at Bosahan for shooting and table.
